attributes.action: Don’t Silence the Streets — Bring Dance Back to Leicester Square!
attributes.additional_details: Busking dancers add life, culture, and energy to our city. They offer free entertainment, support local talent, and bring people together. From hip-hop to traditional dance, they showcase diverse art that tourists and locals love. Banning them takes away joy, expression, and income for hardworking performers. Instead of shutting them down, cities should regulate and celebrate them. Let’s keep dance alive in public spaces.
attributes.background: I’m starting this petition to bring back the dancers to Leicester Square. These artists bring life, culture, and joy to the city — they deserve the right to perform and make a living. Let’s support street art, not silence it

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about this are a matter for Westminster City Council, not the UK Government or Parliament.

Westminster City Council petitions:
https://www.westminster.gov.uk/about-council/democracy/petitions
